channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Lamb chops with pancetta salad & yoghurt dressing
item.description:
Lamb chops with pancetta salad & yoghurt dressing



Gluten-free: use gluten-free bread for the salad..

item.title: Very easy lamb with red wine gravy
item.description:
Very easy lamb with red wine gravy



This is a very simple supper that can be knocked together in no time. Cook as many chops us you need-cutlets will take a little less time. The red wine and redcurrant gravy is so easy that you might as well make the whole quantity even if you are serving fewer than four people..

item.title: Meatball pasta bake
item.description:
Meatball pasta bake



Gluten-free: use gluten-free bread, pasta and stock cube..

item.title: Mango chicken salad
item.description:
Mango chicken salad



Super quick and easy recipe. The curry paste is not too spicy for children to try. If you want, you can add more spice to taste, but not too much or you will drown the other more subtle flavours. Gluten-free: make sure the curry paste is gluten-free..

item.title: Leek and tarragon rigatoni
item.description:
Leek and tarragon rigatoni



Gluten-free: just use gluten-free pasta..

item.title: Leek and salmon pie
item.description:
Leek and salmon pie



Gluten-free: use gluten-free plain flour in the sauce..
